author: Fextralife
description:
Clair Obscur Expedition 33 Lune Guide -  How to Play Lune (Build Tips)
Lune is a powerful character in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, offering a unique playstyle that can turn the tide of battle. But she is arguably one of the most complicated characters to play, and it can be overwhelming when you first start this game. This guide breaks down everything you need to know about her Stains, skills, best builds, and strategies to maximize her potential.

author: Fextralife
description:
Clair Obscur Expedition 33 Gameplay Tips - Beginners Guide (NO Spoilers)
In this Clair Obscure Expedition 33 guide. I'm going to be going over some things that I wish I would have known before I started playing this game, and also some other helpful tips for new players out there. I would say that this game is not overly difficult, but it can be a little bit challenging in the beginning when you're first figuring out a lot of the mechanics, and some things can just make your life easier. If you know about them, rather than finding out about them halfway through the game. 

Timestamp:

1:38 Always Parry

3:35 Load Previous Saves
